project.name: lib-ietf-paws
project.description:
Implementation of RFC 7545: Protocol to Access White-Space (PAWS) Databases
https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7545.txt
History v0.0.1 - first draft of implementation from RFC 7545; basic beans with annotation v0.1.0 - complete beans, add images to documentation v0.2.0 - add custom PawsChannel object, reorganize AVAIL_SPECTRUM_RESP to make it usable v0.2.1 - add timeRange field (EventTime object) to PawsChannel v0.2.2 - add fields second adj channel, query position, enforcement attribute v0.2.3 - add exception attribute to paws channel to indicate processing error v0.3.0 - upgrade JTS to 1.16.1 refctor to org.locationtech.jts v0.4.0 - rename project to from `lib-protocol-paws` to `lib-ietf-paws` 2019-07/26 v0.5.0 - refactor code into 'lib' package, add package-info to specify namespace v0.6.0 - add etsi and fcc enumerated types; rewrite device descriptor v0.7.0 - add PawsInfo class for information queries; extend AntennaCharacteristics v0.8.0 - update DeviceOwner to use LDAP distinguished names instead of VCARD format v0.9.0 - add Ised device descriptor for Canada operation v0.10.0 - update element vs. attribute use; use TreeSet to ensure proper sorting v0.11.0 - add spectrum use; registration; validation request and response messages v0.12.0 - rewrite several classes to better support operation; add validators v0.13.0 - rename PawsChannel and PawsInfo to SpectrumChannel and SpectrumInfo objects; move to PAWS package v0.14.0 - use camelcase xml types for messages; makes soap client mode sensible v0.15.0 - add FCC and ISED enumerated device types; integrate into FCC and ISED device descriptors v0.16.0 - add AvailableSpectrumResponse::responseType field to specify how the spectrum information may be used - change scope of jts-core and xml-adapter to `provided` v0.17.0 - copy all xml adapters local into `adapter` package v0.18.0 - add AbstractChannel to support Spectrum Channel and Info use v0.19.0 - (undone in v0.20.0) move fastPoll enforcement flag from Info to Channel v0.20.0 - rewrite SpectrumInfo to use new SpectrumConsumer class; provides improved detail - add additional validation checks - rename DeviceDesc:deviceType to deviceMode - add 'allowed' field to SpectrumInfo - use Duration in EventTime; add default LPA durations to RuleSetInfo - change FrequencyRange unit of measure from Hertz to MHz - add EventTime `timeRange` field to DeviceCapabilities to better support LPA requests - add `communicatingWith` device descriptor to support US Mode2 operation - add Error element to all message responses v0.21.0 - consolidate deviceDescriptor subclasses into one - rename enumerated deviceType to deviceMode - add spectrumUseNotify validate method to ensure transmit channel power is provided - add request message content validation methods v0.22.0 - add `masterDeviceDesc` field to RegistrationRequest to support SLAVE device registrations - deviceDesc `serialNumber` is required - add channel validation for spectrum use notify message
